column5: Programme descriptionThe MSc Comparative Education and International Development (CEID) programme provides you with both:an academic foundation in the theories, issues, and current debates in comparative education and international developmentthe flexibility to follow your professional interests through a wide range of option coursesExposure to experts across the university and practitioners in the field will allow you to further your networks and consider a multitude of post-graduation possibilities.You may find the MSc CEID is a suitable qualification if you are interested in:
